contentrichtext.text: *Why was this listed here? Please let us know why you list things on VfD. [[User:RickK|Rick]]'''[[User talk:RickK|K''']] 04:35, 12 May 2004 (UTC) ** Patience! [[User:Pteron|Pteron]] 04:40, 12 May 2004 (UTC) *With a name this common it's a little hard to be sure, but this smells of vanity. All this user [http://en.wikipedia.org/w/wiki.phtml?title=Special:Contributions&target=24.91.40.11 24.91.40.11] ever writes about is this guy and things related to his bands. Someone better stop him. He's creating a whole network around this guy and his bands. Entering them in [[2000s]] as major entertainers, creating a host of bad identical articles (not even good redirects) about caricaturists with just a link to Michael Smith etc. Delete. [[User:Pteron|Pteron]] 04:40, 12 May 2004 (UTC) * And to think I almost voted to keep this. Delete. - [[User:Lucky 6.9|Lucky 6.9]] 04:42, 12 May 2004 (UTC) * Keep. It's got a good beat and [http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&q=%22figures+on+a+beach%22+Michael+smith&btnG=Google+Search Google] can dance to it. It may need some NPOV, along with his other articles; I haven't checked them all out yet. [[User:Alcarillo|Alcarillo]] 16:02, 12 May 2004 (UTC) *Delete vanity. Wrong google search, Alcarillo. Try [http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&lr=&q=%22figures+on+a+beach%22+%22Michael+Smith%22&btnG=Search this one], which gets only 24 hits (a good number of which are Wikipedia and its mirrors.) This guy's been playing a long time, but it doesn't seem that he's all that signficant. [[User:Isomorphic|Isomorphic]] 18:13, 12 May 2004 (UTC) *Delete: vanity. [[User:Wile E. Heresiarch|Wile E. Heresiarch]] 04:40, 13 May 2004 (UTC) *Yup. Delete. [[User:Radicalsubversiv|'''R'''adical'''S'''ubversiv]] [[User talk:Radicalsubversiv|'''E''']] 00:25, 17 May 2004 (UTC) *Delete all vanity pages [[User:Ensiform|Ensiform]] 03:33, 17 May 2004 (UTC) * Punk rock vanity. Delete [[User:Jfdwolff|JFW]] | [[User_talk:Jfdwolff|<small>T@lk</small>]] 20:13, 17 May 2004 (UTC)
